name: Dwarf
description: Dwarves are short humanoid people who make some of the finest warriors, miners, and smiths in Faerun.
features: Darkvision up to 12m
Dwarven Resilience: Advantage on saving throws against poison, resistance to poison damage
Dwarven Weapon Training: Proficient with battleaxe, handaxe, light hammer, warhammer

subraces.name: Hill Dwarf
subraces.description: Hill dwarves have keen senses, deep intuition, and remarkable resilience.
features: Dwarven Toughness: Hit point maximum increases by 1 per level

subraces.name: Mountain Dwarf
subraces.description: As a mountain dwarf, you have strong and hardy legs that are accustomed to long treks and difficult terrain.
features: Dwarven Armour Training: Proficiency with light and medium armour

name: Elf
description: Elves are recognisable by their signature pointed ears, but apart from this, they look a lot like humans.
features: Darkvision up to 12m
Fey Ancestry: Advantage on Saving Throws against being charmed, magic can't put them to sleep
Keen Senses: Proficiency in Perception
Elven Weapon Training: Proficient with longswords, shortswords, shortbows, and longbows

subraces.name: High Elf
subraces.description: Heirs of the mystical Feywild, High Elves value magic in all its forms, and even those who do not study spellcraft can manipulate the Weave.
features: High Elf Cantrip: Learn one wizard cantrip, Intelligence is spellcasting ability

subraces.name: Wood Elf
subraces.description: These Elves spend their reclusive lives in Faerun's forests. Decades of training in archery and camouflage are enhanced by an otherworldly swiftness.
features: Fleet of Foot: Base walking speed 10.5m / 35ft
Mask of the Wild: Proficiency in Stealth

subraces.name: Drow
subraces.description: Drow are sometimes referred to as Dark Elves due to their history with the evil goddess Lolth. Drow resemble Elves, with similar pointed ears, but tend to have darker skin shades.
features: Superior Darkvision up to 24m
Drow Weapon Training: Proficient with rapiers, shortswords, and hand crossbows
Drow Magic: Dancing Lights (level 1), Faerie Fire (level 3), Darkness (level 5)

name: Gnome
description: Gnomes are quite similar in appearance to Halflings, but they have pointed ears, and are known for being clever and energetic.
features: Gnome Cunning: Advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, Charisma saving throws

subraces.name: Forest Gnome
subraces.description: With their knack for illusion and innate curiosity, Forest Gnomes tend to get along well with the animals and fey of Faerun's woodlands.
features: Darkvision up to 12m
Speak with Animals: Cast Speak with Animals at will

subraces.name: Rock Gnome
subraces.description: Small and inquisitive, Rock Gnomes are the tinkers and inventors of the gnomish people.
features: Darkvision up to 12m
Artificer's Lore: Add twice proficiency bonus to History checks related to magic items, alchemical objects, or technological devices

subraces.name: Deep Gnome
subraces.description: These gnomes dwell in the depths of the Underdark. Their often grim demeanour is coloured by a sardonic wit that can blossom into whimsical in the company of other gnomes.
features: Superior Darkvision up to 24m
Stone Camouflage: Advantage on Stealth checks to hide in rocky terrain

name: Halfling
description: Halflings are a small Hobbit-like Race who prefer the comforts of home, but have natural luck and dexterity.
features: Brave: Advantage on saving throws against being frightened
Lucky: Reroll 1s on attack rolls, ability checks, saving throws

subraces.name: Lightfoot Halfling
subraces.description: Stealthy but social, these halflings travel all over Faerun to make names for themselves.
features: Naturally Stealthy: Advantage on Stealth checks

subraces.name: Stout Halfling
subraces.description: Stout halflings are hardier than other halflings and share some of the dwarven resistance to poison.
features: Stout Resilience: Advantage on saving throws against poison, resistance to poison damage

name: Human
description: The most common face in Faerun, Humans are known for their tenacity, creativity, and endless capacity for growth.
features: Human Versatility: Proficiency in one skill of choice, carrying capacity increased by 25%
Civil Militia: Proficiency with spears, pikes, halberds, glaives, light armour, shields

name: Half-Elf
description: Half-Elves have pointed ears and are curious, ambitious, versatile, and welcomed everywhere in Faerun.
features: Darkvision up to 12m
Fey Ancestry: Advantage on Saving Throws against being charmed, magic can't put them to sleep
Civil Militia: Proficiency with spears, pikes, halberds, glaives, light armour, shields

subraces.name: High Half-Elf
subraces.description: A touch of the Feywild remains in Half-Elves with this bloodline, and even those untrained in magic possess a hint of wild power.
features: High Elf Cantrip: Learn one wizard cantrip, Intelligence is spellcasting ability

subraces.name: Wood Half-Elf
subraces.description: Like their Wood Elf parent, these Half-Elves have a quickened stride and an eye for stealth. Yet many break away from isolation in Faerun's forests to explore the rest of the Realms.
features: Fleet of Foot: Base walking speed 10.5m / 35ft
Mask of the Wild: Proficiency in Stealth

subraces.name: Drow Half-Elf
subraces.description: Most Half-Drow result from liaisons between Drow and surfacers. While Half-Drow inherit a few magical gifts, they aren't usually raised in the Underdark.
features: Drow Magic: Dancing Lights (level 1), Faerie Fire (level 3), Darkness (level 5)

name: Half-Orc
description: A sturdy race with orcish strength and resilience.
features: Darkvision up to 12m
Savage Attacks: Roll one extra damage die on melee critical hits
Relentless Endurance: When reduced to 0 HP, drop to 1 HP instead (once per long rest)
Menacing: Proficiency in Intimidation

name: Tiefling
description: Tiefling are a horned humanoid race descended from devils of the Nine Hells.
features: Darkvision up to 12m
Hellish Resistance: Resistance to Fire damage

name: Dragonborn
description: A proud race with draconic ancestry and breath weapons.

subraces.name: Black Dragonborn
subraces.description: Dragonborn with black dragon ancestry.
features: Draconic Ancestry: Resistance to Acid damage
Breath Weapon: 5x30ft line of Acid damage

subraces.name: Blue Dragonborn
subraces.description: Dragonborn with blue dragon ancestry.
features: Draconic Ancestry: Resistance to Lightning damage
Breath Weapon: 5x30ft line of Lightning damage

subraces.name: Brass Dragonborn
subraces.description: Dragonborn with brass dragon ancestry.
features: Draconic Ancestry: Resistance to Fire damage
Breath Weapon: 5x30ft line of Fire damage

subraces.name: Bronze Dragonborn

features: Draconic Ancestry: Resistance to Lightning damage
Breath Weapon: 5x30ft line of Lightning damage

subraces.name: Copper Dragonborn

features: Draconic Ancestry: Resistance to Acid damage
Breath Weapon: 5x30ft line of Acid damage

subraces.name: Gold Dragonborn
subraces.description: Dragonborn with gold dragon ancestry.
features: Draconic Ancestry: Resistance to Fire damage
Breath Weapon: 15ft cone of Fire damage

subraces.name: Green Dragonborn
subraces.description: Dragonborn with green dragon ancestry.
features: Draconic Ancestry: Resistance to Poison damage
Breath Weapon: 15ft cone of Poison damage

subraces.name: Red Dragonborn
subraces.description: Dragonborn with red dragon ancestry.

Breath Weapon: 15ft cone of Fire damage

Breath Weapon: 15ft cone of Cold damage

subraces.description: Dragonborn with white dragon ancestry.

Breath Weapon: 15ft cone of Cold damage
